name: Ecstatic Bloom
description: The Ecstatic Bloom is a Huge Celestial creature that radiates life and healing energy. It has vibrant, luminescent features reminiscent of blooming flowers, and its presence inspires warmth and protection against darkness.
memorable: This creature is unique for its ability to regenerate health, its aura that turns undead, and its capacity to enhance the resilience of nearby allies.
goals: To protect life and combat evil, especially against undead threats.
relations: Often found alongside good-aligned celestial beings or in areas rich with life, it opposes undead creatures.
environment: Typically inhabits lush, vibrant areas such as enchanted forests or sacred groves.
strengths: It can regenerate health, turn undead, and enhance allies' resistance, making it a formidable support in battle.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which disrupts its healing abilities.
attacks: Utilizes the Gilded Beam, a powerful ranged spell attack dealing radiant damage, and can stun enemies with a deafening celestial chorus.
most_powerful_ability: The Castigate ability, which can stun non-good-aligned creatures nearby, greatly impacts enemies in combat.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see the true nature of creatures and objects.
skills: Highly skilled in Insight and Perception, both at +9, making it adept at sensing the intentions and environment around it.
additional_information: Immunities to radiant damage and conditions like charmed or frightened.
Can understand all languages and communicate telepathically up to 120 feet.
Foster the Trees ability gives nearby trees advantage on saving throws.
Aura of Life turns undead creatures that come too close.
Blessed Regrowth ability heals good-aligned creatures nearby.
test_queries: huge celestial creature that heals allies
guardian of life that turns undead
ecstatic creature with stunning celestial powers
life-giving celestial being in enchanted forests
